text: Fotuha'a is an island in Lifuka district, in the Haʻapai islands of Tonga. As of 2020, the population is estimated at approximately 100-150 and an area of 1.14 km².GeoHive Tonga == See also == * List of cities in Tonga == References == Category:Islands of Tonga Category:Haʻapai
title: Fotuhaʻa
